pageProduct.name: Vicks Inhaler Nasal Decongestant 2 Pack
pageProduct.description:
Information

More Value With Vicks

Economical, compact and effective. Vicks Nasal Inhaler has been giving a fast and temporary feeling of relief from blocked noses due to colds in seconds. This nasal spray now comes in a two pack and easily fits in the smallest of pockets. You can be assured that wherever a cold gets you, nasal relief is just one sniff away.

General Information

Vicks Nasal Inhaler clears stuffy nose symptoms due to colds. The nasal spray provides blocked nose relief anytime, anywhere.

Economical, compact, and effective, Vicks Nasal Inhaler has been giving fast and temporary feeling of relief from blocked noses due to colds in seconds. This nasal spray soothes congested noses and easily fits in the smallest of pockets. Blocked nose relief anytime, anywhere!


Features:
- Provides relief from a blocked nose in seconds to make breathing feel clear and cool
- Fast and temporary relief from nasal clogging due to colds, hay fever or upper respiratory allergy
- Easily fits in small pockets
- For external use only
- Value twin pack

Boxed Contents: 2 Inhalers (0.5mL x 2)

Size: 2 Pack

KEY FEATURES

• Blocked nose relief anytime, anywhere

Warnings

Use only with head in an upright position. For external use only. Keep tightly closed.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Tamper Evident.
Do not purchase if seal is broken.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: minimum per tube: Menthol (197mg) and Camphor (197mg).

Directions

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.
